tactical_summaries.match_overview: Chelsea FC 2 - 1 West Ham. Chelsea FC won the match with a balanced approach.
tactical_summaries.possession_summary: Chelsea FC had 52.7% possession compared to West Ham's 47.3%, showing a balanced control of the ball.
tactical_summaries.passing_summary: Chelsea FC completed 83.3% of their passes, while West Ham completed 70.3%. This indicates a significant difference in passing quality.

attack_patterns.Chelsea FC: Primary approach: Balanced. Utilized 64 counter-attacks and 1306 build-up sequences.
attack_patterns.West Ham: Primary approach: Balanced. Utilized 55 counter-attacks and 1312 build-up sequences.
